alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Crockett; Gibson; Haywood; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 17 at 1:27PM CST until February 17 at 2:00PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Crockett County in western Tennessee... Southeastern Gibson County in western Tennessee... Southwestern Carroll County in western Tennessee... Central Haywood County in western Tennessee... Northwestern Madison County in western Tennessee... * Until 200 PM CST. * At 126 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Brownsville, moving northeast at 80 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jackson, Brownsville, Humboldt, Milan, Trenton, Fairview, Alamo, Bells, Three Way, Atwood, Nutbush, Belle Eagle, Holly Grove, Adair, Carroll, Medina, Trezevant, Maury City, Gadsden and Gibson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for western Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for western Tennessee.
